mapper.select: SELECT RES_SE_NAME , RES_SE_PHONE , RES_SE_PHONE2 , RES_SE_ADDR , RES_SE_ADDR2 , RES_RE_NAME , RES_RE_PHONE , RES_RE_PHONE2 , RES_RE_ADDR , RES_RE_ADDR2 , ITEM_NAME , ITEM_PRICE , ITEM_WEIGHT , RES_CNT , ITEM_FAREPRICE FROM CAP_DELIVERY_RESERVATION c, TEST t WHERE c.res_number = (SELECT RES_NUMBER FROM TEST WHERE waybill = #{waybill_Num}) and (c.res_re_phone = #{phone_Num} or c.res_re_phone2 = #{phone_Num})

SELECT l.delivery_step , l.process_time , l.product_status , l.charge_place FROM test t INNER JOIN cap_delivery_reservation r ON t.reservation = r.res_number INNER JOIN cap_delivery_list l ON t.waybill = l.waybill_number WHERE t.waybill = #{waybill_Num} ORDER BY l.process_time

SELECT distinct t.waybill , r.res_se_name , r.res_re_name , r.item_name , r.res_cnt FROM test t INNER JOIN cap_delivery_reservation r ON t.reservation = r.res_number INNER JOIN cap_delivery_list l ON t.waybill = l.waybill_number WHERE t.waybill = #{waybill_Num}
